name: Spaced Out (MigDev)
description:
< Spaced Out_

This is a mini Text Adventure Game made for the GeodWare game jam. In this text adventure, the character plays as someone who just woke out of a coma only to find that they are in the end of the world and was left behind. Journey to make it to the space ship before they leave planet, Earth.

Instructions:

This is a text adventure game so everything in game is displayed through text. You start in a hospital room and you have to navigate to the space ship to win. To do this however you need items. In most areas, items will be listed that you can take. Also the directions you can move in will be listed. Read every display for full experience.

 Note: if you don't enjoy the typing sound effect, mute it in the top left corner. 

Once in game all command instructions will be avalible to toggle in the top right corner of the screen! Credits:

Game made completely by me, MigDev.

Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/free-horror-starter-pack-21134...
